column3: Field Marshall / Admiral of the Fleet/ Marshal of the Air Force
General of Sri Lanka Army/Admiral of Sri Lanka Navy/ Air Chief Marshal of Sri Lanka Air Force
Officers in the Rank of Lieutenant Colonel  and above  of Sri Lanka Army
Officers in the Rank of Commander  and above  of Sri Lanka Navy
Officers in the Rank of Wing Commander and above  of Sri Lanka Air Force
Police officers above the rank of Asst. Superintendent of Police
